DocAttribute.Name: LocationAtRelatingElement
DocAttribute.Documentation: Local placement of the port relative to its distribution element's local placement. The element in question is that, which plays the role of the relating element in the connectivity relationship.

DocAttribute.Name: LocationAtRelatedElement
DocAttribute.Documentation: Local placement of the port relative to its distribution element's local placement. The element in question is that, which plays the role of the related element in the connectivity relationship.

DocAttribute.Name: ProfileOfPort
DocAttribute.Documentation: Profile that defines the port connection geometry. It is placed inside the XY plane of the location, given at the relating and (optionally) related distribution element.
